Author: invincibletitan33
Text: Breathe. Breathe. Drink some water or peppermint tea, distract yourself, watch TV or go for a walk.  As much as you wanna purge and get it out of your system, I promise that eating is not going to have made a difference. You have to eat 3000cals over your tdee to gain. Yes, purging will feel like it fixes things right now, but it's hurting your body in the long run.   You've got this, hang in there, I promise this feeling will pass ðŸ’•
